about_the_game:
Your Majesty, welcome to your dynasty!

Here you will experience love and intrigue, and after years of war, you will end the chaos and establish a new dynasty. Your dynasty is in ruins, and every decision you make will affect its future.

In this game, you are free to customize your personal image, as the new Dynasty queen you have your own exclusive clothing and dress up.

The new imperial Palace is a very large and magnificent city, you can explore the palace outside the palace, in addition to the daily court you can also cultivate their own role, you can also cultivate feelings with your lover, outside the palace market can buy you want medicine can also go to more places to meet new friends.

In this game, there are lovers with different personalities and different appearances waiting to meet you, score a romantic love song, and dozens of exclusive plot lovers have different endings after the completion of the strategy.

A new city, a new dynasty, a new journey. May your Majesties enjoy themselves.

Your Majesty, welcome to your dynasty!

Here you will experience love and intrigue, and after years of war, you will end the chaos and establish a new dynasty. Your dynasty is in ruins, and every decision you make will affect its future.

In this game, you are free to customize your personal image, as the new Dynasty queen you have your own exclusive clothing and dress up.

The new imperial Palace is a very large and magnificent city, you can explore the palace outside the palace, in addition to the daily court you can also cultivate their own role, you can also cultivate feelings with your lover, outside the palace market can buy you want medicine can also go to more places to meet new friends.

In this game, there are lovers with different personalities and different appearances waiting to meet you, score a romantic love song, and dozens of exclusive plot lovers have different endings after the completion of the strategy.

name: Queen: Sun & Moon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5G HZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.5G HZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Queen: Sun Moon is a female emperor life simulation game. You start your new dynasty. There are many decisions you need to make, many talents waiting for you to dig, the family is eroding your court, there are lovers, there are many beautiful women waiting to meet you...
